dialogues.name: Necromancer
dialogues.text: Another 'hero' steps into my domain. Tell me, do you truly believe you’re different from the rest?

choices.text: I’m not looking for a fight. Just let me through.
I won’t be another name on your list.

dialogues.name: Necromancer
dialogues.text: Clever words or steel won’t save you here. Answer this: *'I speak without a mouth, hear without ears—no body, yet the wind gives me life.'* What am I?

dialogues.name: Necromancer
dialogues.text: Hmph. Sharp enough. *She dissolves into shimmering light.*

dialogues.name: Necromancer
dialogues.text: Fool. *Her blade ignites with neon fire.* Let’s see how you fare in battle.
